main

Class EstuaryAdventureMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.EstuaryAdventureMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, Tickable

    public class EstuaryAdventureMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Tickable, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This main control structure of this game is very similar to an online tutorial series entitled "Java Game Development" This is because Abraham made a game a couple of years ago using these tutorials for fun, and so our implementation ended up being very similar. However, we made slight optimizations so that the rendering is more efficient.
    Author:
    Abraham McIlvaine
